resources.name: Anthropic Documentation
resources.description: The official documentation for Claude Code, including installation instructions, usage guidelines, API references, tutorials, examples, loads of information that I won't list individually. Like Claude Code, the documentation is frequently updated.
resources.author: Anthropic

resources.name: Anthropic Quickstarts
resources.description: Offers comprehensive development guides for three distinct AI-powered demo projects with standardized workflows, strict code style guidelines, and containerization instructions.
resources.author: Anthropic

resources.name: Claude Code GitHub Actions
resources.description: Official GitHub Actions integration for Claude Code with examples and documentation for automating AI-powered workflows in CI/CD pipelines.
resources.author: Anthropic
